thread.title: Netflix Is Raising Prices Again, Don#039;t Panic
thread.title_full: Netflix Is Raising Prices Again, Don#039;t Panic

title: Netflix Is Raising Prices Again, Don#039;t Panic
text:
Get Entertainment Alerts 
8 Oct 2015 05:03 PM EST 
Netflix, you've bested us again. The streaming service has decided to raise its prices yet again. Get thy pitchforks ready! But alas, this time around the change isn't actually too shocking. he standard plan, which allows users to watch TV and movies on two different devices at the same time, will now cost $9.99 per month—up $1 from its current $8.99 price. For those who either have a whole lot of friends or need to have every device in the house playing Friends at the same time, the premium membership will continue to cost $11.99 per month—that gets you streaming on up to four different platforms. Not too shabby.
